Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED1 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCRED1 ( ITCRED1CODI, PROYCODI, BARRA, VNPU, VOPU, TIPO, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCRED1CODI, :PROYCODI, :BARRA, :VNPU, :VOPU, :TIPO, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCRED1 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, BARRA = :BARRA, VNPU = :VNPU, VOPU = :VOPU, TIPO = :TIPO, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCRED1CODI = :ITCRED1CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED1 ORDER BY ITCRED1CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCRED1 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED1 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCRED1CODI ASC
